mapper.select: SELECT brtp.bs_id, sum(brtp.item_score) as item_score, bp.bidding_evaluate_type AS type FROM bidding_record_to_professionals brtp LEFT JOIN bidding_professionals bp ON brtp.bps_id = bp.id WHERE brtp.del_flag = '0' and brtp.is_submit = '1' group by brtp.bs_id,bp.bidding_evaluate_type order by bp.bidding_evaluate_type
